description: JurisPro provides a free directory of expert witnesses in over 10,000 areas of expertise.

cases.title: Testimony of Professional Engineering Expert Witness Limited in Products Liability Case
cases.description: A Professional Engineering Expert Witness was allowed to testify on the likelihood of harm using a bow and arrow device, but could not testify on feasible alternative designs.

cases.title: Forensic Accounting Expert Witness Allowed to Testify on Issues Regarding an Alleged Ponzi Scheme
cases.description: The U.S. District Court - District of Utah ruled that Plaintiff's Forensic Accounting Expert Witness opinions will help the trier of fact.

cases.title: Osteopathy Expert Witness Allowed to Testify in Med Mal Case
cases.description: The testimony of Plaintiff's Osteopathy Expert Witness was not speculative on the issue of causation and damages.
